website_summaries.verdict: Specifically designed for sensitive skin with a non-detergent base.
pros: Made using olive polyphenols that makes skin soft and supple
Cleanses makeup from face too, so there is no need for an extra product
cons: Very gentle cleaners and not recommended for acne-prone skin

customer_reviews.title: I have never spent this much on face wash before ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never spent this much on face wash before, but it's well worth it. I have really sensitive skin and this is the only wash I've found that cleans my face without drying it out or causing breakouts. It has a very mild smell and it leaves my skin feeling really smooth and soft. I've noticed that it only takes a small drop for each wash and the jar lasts me almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Irving

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is great. I have very sensitive skin and it doesn’t irritate my skin at all. Only downside is that my skin is more oily than I realized so I need more scrub/exfoliation so I have to use a separate exfoliator a few times a week as well to balance my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kempa

customer_reviews.title: Removed makeup but leaves skin moist.
customer_reviews.text: Gentle, but very effective. Removed makeup, but left my skin soft and not dry. Very pleasing feel, and no scent. Definitely a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: B Perlik

customer_reviews.title: The box looked like it was from some ratchet warehouse
customer_reviews.text: No clue where this soap came from.. I know this product and was surprised by the price. The box looked like it was from some ratchet warehouse, smashed, dented. The smell is nothing like the original product. Consistency and color is similar but I'm still unsure if I want to wash with it. Too good to be true?
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: I have extremely sensitive eyes and this cleanser doesn't bother ...
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive eyes and this cleanser doesn't bother them at all. I can use it to take off make-up (and it removes it completely in one application). I'd give it 5 stars, except after a few weeks of use, the pump on the bottle broke and it's kind of a pain to use now.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I switched from another high end cleanser and was worried that this might not be worth the money but it cleans well and doesn't strip my skin.I've had no breakouts after starting a new line which usually happens. Also, the scent is so mild, it's foams just the right amount and if it gets into your mouth somehow there is not a nasty taste like so many cleansers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn H Garberich

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Perricone
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years. They have tweaked the formula a bit over time, but it is still a great product for sensitive skin/
customer_reviews.author: D. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: which was good for makeup removal (neuropeptide is creamy) but it made ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as cheaper alternative to my normal product (neuropeptide cleanser). Very soapy, which was good for makeup removal (neuropeptide is creamy) but it made me break out like a teenager. Use only as back up now when waiting for refill on my neuropeptide cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Gina P.

customer_reviews.title: Would not use any other cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Very mild. This bottle of cleanser lasts a long time. I bought a two more bottles as Christmas presents. That is how much I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Horton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have hypersensitive skin and this is the best cleanser I have used. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash - super clean
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, acne-prone skin. This face wash keeps my face clean and helps me keep my face clear from pimples. If I get one, this face wash helps a lot. It can also remove makeup like mascara if you don't want to use makeup remover. My face does not dry out when I use this, but I still apply moisturizer before makeup for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: The best cleanser I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I generally don't spend this much on cleanser but I absolutely love this product. I've had lots of people tell me how great my skin looks. This is the second time I've bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Great for Me
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for 3 years. Since it is in a glass bottle it's not appropriate for travel, and I am forced to substitute facial cleaners that are never as good. It does take off eye makeup. I've never had a problem with it drying out my skin, and my skin is by nature very dry.
customer_reviews.author: lmoon

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser, very gentle
customer_reviews.text: I have been having a problem with dry skin on parts of my face and have been trying all brands of cleanser. This one seems to be the least drying so I’m sticking with it.
customer_reviews.author: BookaholicTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Also great for removing makeup (not eye)
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin but this didn’t aggravate my skin at all and kept it clear. Also great for removing makeup (not eye).
customer_reviews.author: L. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Works fine on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a month now...and it works fine...I still think the Acne.org cleanser works better. Especially for the difference in pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Gentle but thorough on sensitive skin and non-drying to boot. A little goes a long way. Its my absolute favorite cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: be careful with the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I dropped the bottle the day I got it and cleanser went everywhere! I was able to scoop some up, actually quite a bit, and save it in another container. If they are going to use glass, they should make it slightly thicker. As for the cleanser. It is ok. I like it better than any drugstore brand, but I found the sensitive a little too mild. I have very sensitive skin, but I've now bought the non-sensitive version to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so far. I have only had it a couple of weeks, but my skin has never felt it better, but I have also paired it with Argon oil and that could be part of the magical mix. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product as it was excessively drying to my complexion Unable to use Also smelled medicinal
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Effective, gentle, great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value on a high end, effective, cleanser. I am extremely sensitive to all face products even those marketed as "gentle". Cetaphil even bothers me!! Soothe by rodan and fields is also harsh and burns my skin. Dove soap, you name it I cannot use it. Even if I keep it totally away from my eyes, somehow my eyes end up red and burning. I am red haired and have type one skin. This is so gentle I can use it to wash off eye makeup and it effectively removes all makeup in a single wash with just half a pump! I think you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Princesmom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is the only cleanser that I have found that doesn't dry my skin or make my face itch. I have been using this for over 3 years and after spending a large amount of money on other products I am very happy with this. I bought a small plastic container for travel use.
customer_reviews.author: Digit Head

customer_reviews.title: DRYING
customer_reviews.text: This is very drying. My poor skin was ravaged from this stuff; gentle--no way! I would never try this if I were you. The price is not wrong, like the other poster says, but the effect certainly is! Go with Avene! Much better :-D
customer_reviews.author: Louis von Puppy

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it is expensive, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a cleanser search for some time. I have rosacea, psoriasis, eczema, and skin allergies, plus I am over 50 and my skin is like a desert. This is absolutely the best cleanser I have ever used. I bought it at a discount store for a steal and of course loved it. I have been using it for 4 months and just now getting low. I love the gel to creamy texture. It dispenses the right amount with one pump so less waste. It has a mild scent, almost undetectable, but pleasant. I highly recommend trying it. I think Sephora will give small sample sizes to try - not verified.
customer_reviews.author: pescecanina

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I keep going back to this cleanser. Gentle, doesn't impart greasy or dry feel. Leaves skin refreshed. I like pure products with plant derived benefits like this. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not so gentle
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this cleanser from Sephora. I tried it on my hand first, and it seemed very creamy and gentle. It does not have much of a scent, and it rinsed off well. That night I washed my face with it, and it removed all of my makeup, including my eye makeup. But boy did it dry out my skin! And the next day my face was very red,parched, and irritated! It is two day's later, and I am still dry, and itchy from this cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor bottle
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing but the bottle pump is a piece of junk and fills up with water in the shower
customer_reviews.author: mrnewps
